replies.body:
Do u remember my from THE classic days of mc zone name was tapakasi

what monitor do u Use to game?

what mice do u Use to game?
replies.body_tagged:
Do u remember my from THE classic days of mc zone name was tapakasi

what monitor do u Use to game?

what mice do u Use to game?

replies.body:
No, I think I don't remember was because I took a year break from Minecraft 

I don't know what the monitor is but this is my setup

I got a gaming keyboard and mousing combo. The combo is, TteSports Gaming Gear Combo. I don't recommend this as it is quite loud. The old mouse I used to use was a Logitech M305, it's a small mouse but I get 7 cps normal clicking on it, same with the Tte sports mouse
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I play soccer in the winter season (Australia's winter) and then six a side and futsal in the summer.

I am 5, turning 6 this year

Mr Jongh was a very nice person, he is good at pvp and is my best and worst student :P
